content: materials medium weight 4 yarn any brand will do i used the yarn linked in colors soft pink red and white 5 00mm crochet hook my fave hooks scissors darning needles stitch markers i personally don t use a stitch marker for this pattern but if you lose track of where you started easily or you re a beginner stitch markers are very helpful pattern notes *this pattern follows size s but sizes xs-5xl are also available *this pattern follows us crochet terms *turning chain 3 does count as a double_crochet stitch in this pattern
